title.narrative: PROTECTIVE SYSTEMS FOR CHD AND ADOL

description.narrative: By 2018, policymakers, justice actors, social organizations, communities and families are equipped with knowledge, capacities, systems and mechanisms to provide protective environments for children and adolescents, with a gender perspective., which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration, Child Protection Systems, Justice For Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Emergency response to earthquake Aplril 16th 2016

description.narrative: La prevencion a la violencia se ha trabajado con diversas Instituciones del Estado para el fortalecimiento de sistemas de atencion especializados. La participacion de adolescentes se ha fortalecido para la prevencion de violencia. | Status:Partially Met | As-of Date:24/01/2019
